CustomField.description: BO-1848 This field was created to reference the most recent Account Campaign, The main use case for this field is for external applications, like Apollo. Sales reps have a list of accounts that theyâ€™re responsible for out-bounding, and the accounts are tagged with an Account Campaign.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reference to the latest campaign tagged to this account for sales outreach
